/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a high angle, providing a bird's eye view of the scene below. The street is flanked by tall buildings, their facades painted in shades of beige and gray, punctuated by occasional splashes of red and green. The sky above is a clear blue, with a smattering of clouds adding to the urban landscape. Cars and pedestrians animate the scene, adding life to the otherwise static architecture. The image is bathed in the light of day, highlighting the colors and details of the cityscape.
